name: Notice.AAA6.CP.HearingFee.Required.Claimant
titleEn: You must pay the hearing fee
titleCy: Rhaid i chi dalu ffi'r gwrandawiad
descriptionEn: You must either pay the hearing fee of ${hearingFee} or apply for help with fees. You must do this by ${hearingDueDateEn}. If you do not take one of these actions, your claim will be struck out.
descriptionCy: Rhaid i chi naill ai dalu ffi'r gwrandawiad o ${hearingFee} neu wneud cais am help i dalu ffioedd. Mae'n rhaid i chi wneud hyn erbyn ${hearingDueDateCy}. Os na fyddwch yn cymryd un o'r camau hyn, bydd eich hawliad yn cael ei ddileu.
